Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, it sounds fun, but Mama and Papa's jobs
are really busy, and we don't have any real "days
off."
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I think I could probably swing it, but Mama's
really busy. It might be hard for her to find the
time.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! There you are, <PARENT>! Can we ask you a
biiig favor?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah! We wanna go on a picnic with the whole
family!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Papa says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?
Actually, let's go right now!
We can go sometime soon.
Sorry, I'm really busy...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>We can, <PARENT>?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
YAAAAY!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>We're goin' on a picniiiiic! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wait, you mean right now? Are you sure? I
mean, I can manage okay, but do you have the
time for it?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You sure? Then what are we waiting for? The
kids'll love it, too.
<PAGE>
Okay! <CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>, we've gotta get
ready before we can go. Do you wanna help
out?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>That means we can go sooner!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hahaha! Tag, you're it, <CHILD_NAME_W>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tag! I gotcha, <PARENT>! Now you're it!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! That was the funnest day ever!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! But I think I ran too much. I'm super tired
now. It was still lots of fun, though. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whew! That was fun. It feels like forever since I
played this hard. But it's about time we started
heading home.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks for making time to play with the kids
today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I feel like things like this really bring us together
more as a family, y'know?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? We can? Yaaaay!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks, <PARENT>! I'm gonna think about it every
day until then! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's great news, you two! See? Sometimes it
pays to ask.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Awww...we can't?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Maaan! Oh well. I guess working is important...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, see? You shouldn't pester your Mama too
much.
<PAGE>
But she did say she'll do her best to make some
time at some point so...oh, hey! I've got an idea.
<PAGE>
Listen up, you two. If you're both really good
and help Mama out with her work a whole
bunch, you'll help her free up time for a picnic!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Yeah, we can do that! I promise to be extra
good and help <PARENT> out lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Yeah! We'll help a whole, whole, whoooole lot
so we can go on that picnic! ♪

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hrm. It does sound fun, yes, but Mama is a
farmer, and farms don't allow for too many days
off.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You can ask her, but don't get your hopes up, all
right?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Papa says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right now? Are you sure you've taken care of
your responsibilities for the day?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Then I have no objections. All right,
<CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We'll need to prepare for our picnic. Come and
lend me a hand.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Whew! At this age, there's no way I can keep up
with a child's boundless energy all day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Still, they look like they've had plenty of fun
already, and it's getting late. We ought to head
home.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think we all had a wonderful time together as a
family today, wouldn't you say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you for making time for this little outing,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's wonderful news, isn't it, you two.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, now, no pouting. Mama did say she
would do the best she could, you know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If both of you help with her chores as much as
you can, she might finish work early enough for
us to go someday.
<PAGE>
But if you just sit there and pout, she won't be
done working on time, and we won't be able to
go at all. That sounds unfortunate, no?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Yeah, it does. Hmm...it sounds all good with me
as long as it's on the day the restaurant's closed.
<PAGE>
But Mama doesn't have any regular days off like
that. It might be hard for her to find the time.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Papa says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What, right now? Are you sure you've got time
for that? You can't just invent time you don't
have, y'know.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? Okay then, I guess we're gonna have to
hurry up and get ready.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH><CHILD_NAME_M>! <CHILD_NAME_W>! C'mon and help me,
okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew. It's been forever since I went out and
played like this. It was great. Still, it's getting
late. We should probably head home.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks for clearing some time in your schedule
today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
It sure was great to take those two out and have
fun as a family. And judging by how tired they
look, I'd say they had a good time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hear that, you two? Isn't that great?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
C'mon, no pestering Mama like that. It's not like
she said we'll never be able to go.
<PAGE>
She's trying as hard as she can to make time
soon, okay?
<PAGE>
So she needs you guys to be really good and
help out with chores. Then Mama will be able to
go on a picnic.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, that is true...
<PAGE>
But your mama's job requires her attention each
and every day. It may be difficult for her to find
the time.
<PAGE>
However, for your sakes, I'm sure she'd want to
try to make time. It is certainly worth asking.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Papa says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right now? Well, I'm perfectly fine with that, but
are you certain your duties are taken care of?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I see. I am sure the children will be very happy
to hear that. Let's be off, then.
<PAGE>
<CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>, would you help me?
We need to get ready to go.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew! Even when I myself was a child, I never
ran around this rambunctiously!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm positively exhausted, and yet...I feel so
refreshed. This was quite a pleasant way to
spend a day.
<PAGE>
However, I'm afraid I don't have much energy left
in me, and it is getting late. It's probably best we
started on home.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much for making the time for
our children's rash request today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You've given our children a wonderfully fun
afternoon, instead of disappointing them with
the reality of work.
<PAGE>
If you ever find the time again some afternoon, I
think it would be splendid if we could take
another family picnic like this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There, did you hear that? Isn't that wonderful?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, now, you two. No pouting. Mama said she
would do her best to find the time in the future.
<PAGE>
If you both behave yourselves and help your
busy mama out by doing your chores...
<PAGE>
Then perhaps she can finish her work early.
Then we may yet be able to take a family picnic.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Yeah, I know it would. But your mama's job
doesn't give her much time off, y'know? She
keeps herself pretty busy.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Papa says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hold on...right now? You sure it'll be okay to
skip out on work this afternoon?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, gotcha. It feels kinda sudden, but the kids
will love it. Let's do it, then.
<PAGE>
Hey, <CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>. Come help me
get ready. We're goin' on a picnic.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whew. I can't even remember the last time I
played this hard. I guess I got a little caught up
in the kids' excitement.
<PAGE>
But it's gettin' late, and we should probably head
back.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks for making the time to hang out with the
kids today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
And hey, I had a good time too. Going out with
the family like this was a new experience for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There. Hear that, you two?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, no pestering your mama. She said she'd try
to make the time sometime, y'know.
<PAGE>
If you two are good and help out with chores
and stuff, it'll make it easier for her to do that.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm...yeah, it would be, but Mama's got a
busy schedule and not much time off. It might
be hard for her to find the time.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Papa says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you sure it's okay to let your
work go for an afternoon?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well now! In that case, why not? It's kinda
sudden, but the kids are really happy, and hey, I
love the spontaneity of it.
<PAGE>
Okay, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>. Let's get
ready to go. Who wants to help Papa?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow. It's been forever since I ran around outside
like this. I feel totally spent now, but man, was
that fun.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, thanks for listening to the kids'
crazy idea today.
<PAGE>
We not only didn't disappoint them, we made a
great family memory together, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's good to hear, isn't it you two?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey now, no pestering Mama. She did say she'll
do her best to make time for it eventually.
<PAGE>
If both of you are really good and help Mama out
with chores, I'm sure she'll find the time for us
to go on a picnic together.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
True. But farm work does not grant any specific
"day off," as other jobs do.
<PAGE>
I can leave my farm in the care of my servants
for a day, of course...
<PAGE>
But Papa can't do that. It may be difficult for
him to find the time.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Mama says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What, right now? Are you certain it's all right to
leave your work for the afternoon?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I see. How very like you, <MYNAME>! Another
daring, spontaneous choice from Papa! ♪
<PAGE>
Well then, we must hurry and get ready.
<CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>, come here and help
me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness, children have a truly amazing supply
of energy. I never would have understood it by
simply watching them putter about the lawn.
<PAGE>
I can barely keep up. I'm exhausted! But of
course, I had a marvelous time.
<PAGE>
It is unfortunate that this delightful day must
end, but I'm afraid it is getting late, and we must
return home.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you. You truly went the extra
mile to make sure our children were not
disappointed.
<PAGE>
You make a first-rate Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There, isn't that good news, you two?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now now! Let's put away those sad faces, both
of you.
<PAGE>
Papa has said before that he would do his best
to make time for it someday soon.
<PAGE>
If both of you behave yourselves and help Papa
with his chores, I'm sure it will be easier for him
to find the time.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmmm, it does sound fun, but Papa is very
busy with work and the farm always needs
attention. He might have trouble finding time.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Mama says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure it's all right to leave the farm be for
the afternoon? I'd hate to ask you to neglect
work you need to do...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, with that settled, we'd best start preparing!
<PAGE>
Kids, could you come help me, please?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Goodness, that was so much fun! But I'm afraid
my lack of physical strength was on display for
all the world to see.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I've never been the most athletic person, even as
a child. You'd more often find me in a bookstore
than on the playground.
<PAGE>
But if I'm going to at least attempt to keep up
with our children, I'll have to put in some
training; build a little muscle!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well, it seems the children had plenty of fun too,
judging by how tired they look. We should be
getting home.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you. Because you were kind
enough to rearrange your schedule for us, our
family had a fun afternoon together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, isn't that wonderful news, you two?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, no pouting, you two. Papa isn't
saying we'll never be able to go on a picnic, just
not right now.
<PAGE>
But he did promise to try really hard to take us
all sometime soon.
<PAGE>
If you're both very good and help Papa around
the farm, I'll bet it'd be a lot easier for him to find
the time.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Yeah, it would...
<PAGE>
Buuuut...Papa's job is really, really busy, and he
can't just take a day off, so it might be hard for
him to find the time.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Mama says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What, right now?! Are you sure it'll be okay if
you skip work for the afternoon? I don't wanna
twist your arm or anything...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, okay. Yeah, I guess there's something to be
said for acting in the spirit of the moment, huh?
<PAGE>
I guess we'd better get ready, then. <CHILD_NAME_M>,
<CHILD_NAME_W>, do you wanna come help me?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heehee! Wow, I had such a great time!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'd love to stay out here and play with the kids
some more, but it's getting late. We should
probably head home.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, thanks for rolling with the kids' off-
the-wall request today.
<PAGE>
You're such a loving father and a sweet
husband...I think I just fell for you even harder.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There, see? Isn't that great news, you two?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I'll make sure I can get the day off
when you take yours.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah-ah! Turn those frowns around, you two.
<PAGE>
Papa did say he'd do his best to take us out
sometime soon.
<PAGE>
So if both of you are really good and help him
out around the farm, I'll bet he'd have plenty of
time for a picnic!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmmm...it would, yes...
<PAGE>
But Papa's job doesn't have any official days off,
so he might be hard-pressed to find the time.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Mama says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you sure? The children and I
would be very happy if we could go, yes...
<PAGE>
But I know you have so much work on your
plate. I don't want you to feel like you have to do
this.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, okay. If you think it'll be all right, then that's
good enough for me. Let's all go on a picnic! ♪
<PAGE>
Now that that's decided, it's time to get ready.
<CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>, could you come help
Mama out?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheeee! I had so much fun playing around!
Look at us...we're all covered with dirt, but it
doesn't matter!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We're going to have to get changed and put our
dirty clothes in the wash. It's late, and we
should probably head back.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you so much for taking us on that picnic
today, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I had lots of fun, and I know the kids did, too.
You really are a great Papa.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another
picnic someday.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you hear that? Isn't that great, you two?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. If you both look that sad, you'll make
Papa really sad, too! Come on, how about a little
smile?
<PAGE>
Besides, it isn't like Papa said we'd never be able
to go at all. He said he's going to try to make
time for us to go sometime soon.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So why don't you both be really good and help
Papa out with chores around the farm, okay?
<PAGE>
That will help him get done with his work
sooner, and then we'll all be able to go on a
picnic together!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hrm. This could be difficult. Papa's job is not
one that allows him to easily take a day off.
<PAGE>
I understand what both of you are asking, but it
may be harder to manage than you think.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some
snacks with us in a picnic basket, and then we
could all play together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Mama says you're super busy and you don't
get "days off."
<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you
too super busy?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure it will be all right to leave the farm
unattended all afternoon? I'm very glad you've
agreed, but you needn't force it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. If you believe so, then I have no

<PAGE>
Let's hurry and get ready, then. <CHILD_NAME_M>,
<CHILD_NAME_W>, will you come help me prepare,
please?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>

<PAGE>
My parents were always busy when I was little,
so we had little opportunity to take family trips.
This was a new experience for me.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>, for listening to our

<PAGE>

you spared the children disappointment and
gave us all a wonderful family memory.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah, thank you <PARENT>! Let's go on another

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>

<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>However...<MYNAME>, I will not have you

<PAGE>

injuring yourself at work to create that time

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm sure if both of you are very good and help

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sounds super fun, right? We could take some

<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But Mama says you're super busy and you don't

<PAGE>
Can't we go, <PARENT>? Pleeeeease? Or are you

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>

<PAGE>
<CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>, come help me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>

<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Actually...I think maybe not even then.
<PAGE>

<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Anyway, it's getting late. We should pack this

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>

<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for playing with us today, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
